summary.problem_solved: Defines property structures for the `ModularForm` system and various input elements (Text, Select, Date, etc.).

exports.name: BaseElementProps
exports.description_one_line: Common props for all form elements.

exports.name: FormElement
exports.description_one_line: Union of all supported form element interfaces.

details.what_it_does: Union type representing all possible form element types that can be passed to ModularForm. Includes input, date picker, select, multi-select, textarea, phone input, separator, checkbox, and custom elements.
details.type_definition: type FormElement = InputElement | DateInputElement | SelectElement | MultiSelectProps | InternationalInputProps | CustomElementProps | TextAreaElement | SelectWithSearchProps | FormSeparatorProps | CheckboxContainerProps | DurationInputProps;

minimal_correct.title: Using FormElement type

extensive_correct.title: Composing multiple element types in a form

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Using wrong element type property

symbols.name: BaseElementProps
symbols.description_one_line: Common props shared by all form elements.

details.what_it_does: Base interface providing common properties inherited by all form element types. Includes labeling, validation, styling, and layout options applicable to any input element.

minimal_correct.title: Using BaseElementProps in custom form element

extensive_correct.title: Applying common element properties

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Not extending BaseElementProps in custom elements

symbols.name: InputElement
symbols.description_one_line: Props configuration for text and number input elements in ModularForm.

details.what_it_does: Defines all properties for configuring text, email, number, and password input fields. Extends BaseElementProps with input-specific features like validation types, value binding, and event handlers.

minimal_correct.title: Basic text input element

extensive_correct.title: Input with validation and handlers
extensive_correct.code:
const phoneInput: InputElement = {
  type: 'input',
  inputType: 'tel',
  name: 'phone',
  labelContent: 'Phone Number',
  validationName: 'numbers',
  required: true,
  onChange: handlePhoneChange,
  onKeyDown: handleEnterKey,
  defaultValue: '+972'
};

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Missing required type property

symbols.name: DateInputElement
symbols.description_one_line: Props configuration for date picker inputs with calendar UI.

details.what_it_does: Defines all properties for date input fields with integrated calendar picker. Includes styling options for the calendar component, text input styling, and day highlighting options.

minimal_correct.title: Basic date input

extensive_correct.title: Styled date picker with custom calendar
extensive_correct.code:
const birthDateInput: DateInputElement = {
  type: 'dateInput',
  name: 'birthDate',
  labelContent: 'Birth Date',
  required: true,
  calendarClassName: 'custom-calendar',
  selectedDayClassName: 'highlighted-day',
  todayDayClassName: 'today-marker',
  inputClassName: 'date-input-field',
  onChange: handleDateChange
};

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Using input type instead of dateInput

symbols.name: SelectElement
symbols.description_one_line: Props configuration for dropdown select inputs.

details.what_it_does: Defines properties for basic select dropdown elements. Supports option arrays with value and label pairs, sorting (alphabetical or numerical), styling customization, and change callbacks.

minimal_correct.title: Basic select dropdown

extensive_correct.title: Sorted select with custom styling
extensive_correct.code:
const roleSelect: SelectElement = {
  type: 'select',
  name: 'role',
  labelContent: 'User Role',
  options: roles,
  sortDirection: 'abc',
  required: true,
  selectClassName: 'role-select',
  optionClassName: 'role-option',
  onChange: handleRoleChange
};

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Passing options without value property

symbols.name: ModularFormProps
symbols.description_one_line: Complete props configuration for the ModularForm component.

details.what_it_does: Defines all properties for configuring a ModularForm component. Includes form elements array, submission handler, styling, direction (RTL/LTR) support, label auto-alignment, error handling, and loading states.

minimal_correct.title: Basic ModularForm setup

extensive_correct.title: Advanced form with styling and callbacks
extensive_correct.code:
const advancedForm: ModularFormProps = {
  elements: formElements,
  submitFunction: async (e) => await submitForm(e),
  buttonContent: 'Submit',
  headerContent: 'User Registration',
  direction: 'ltr',
  autoFixLabelsWidth: true,
  labelsCommonClassName: 'form-label',
  errorClassName: 'error-message',
  loaderProps: { color: 'blue' },
  onLoad: (form) => console.log('Form ready')
};

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Not providing required submitFunction
